body:
##ON-Demand Data sharing framework as a Web Service
 
  This web-services framework software for small and medium businesses provides a secure, reliable, 
  entree to Business Process Nets, allowing easy access to supply chains, 
  offering complete features for B2B data sharing and system integration. All this is ON-Demand with
  ZERO software installation requirements so that you can quickly meet your requirements for partner 
  and supply chain integration using just a browser and a data analyst - no programming is required.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: placeholder for a public domain site
name: B2bpo
